solution_line_template: There are {minutes_per_hour} minutes in an hour, so {total_hours} hours x {minutes_per_hour} = <<{total_hours}*{minutes_per_hour}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes} minutes.

Her family was in the bathroom {oldest_daughter_time} + {youngest_daughter_time} + {husband_time} = <<{oldest_daughter_time}+{youngest_daughter_time}+{husband_time}={family_bathroom_time}>>{family_bathroom_time} minutes.
Mrs. Parker has {total_minutes} minutes - {family_bathroom_time} minutes = <<{total_minutes}-{family_bathroom_time}={mrs_parker_time}>>{mrs_parker_time} minutes in the bathroom.
